mapper.sql: id, outCode, bookCode, typeCode, outNum, status, createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.outCode, t.refCode, t.bookCode, t1.bookName, t2.typeName, t.outNum, CASE t.`status` WHEN 1 THEN '已借出' ELSE '' END AS statusName, t.`day`, t.createTime, t.createName FROM cs_out_stock_record AS t LEFT JOIN cs_book_info t1 ON t.bookCode = t1.bookCode LEFT JOIN cs_book_type t2 ON t.typeCode = t2.`code`
AND t.outCode LIKE '${outCode}%'
AND t.refCode LIKE '${refCode}%'
